trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto que especifica o esquema de uma linha de dados.

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRowPresenter and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O GridViewRowPresenter e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>classes de suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>modo de visualização para uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Positions o conteúdo de uma linha, de acordo com o tamanho de correspondente <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A área de utilizar para apresentar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that is used to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: O real <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que é utilizado para apresentar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo de dados a apresentar numa linha.

trans-unit.source: The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
trans-unit.target: A utilização típica do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] é para o colocar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The template binds the Content property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: O modelo vincula a propriedade de conteúdo para uma propriedade do controlo utilizando [extensão de Markup TemplateBinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind the Content property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte mostra como vincular a propriedade de conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle #ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)][!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle #ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml) ] # # XAML texto utilização Consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the content of a row.
trans-unit.target: O objecto que representa o conteúdo de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines the area that is required to display the row.
trans-unit.target: Determina a área que é necessário para apresentar a linha.

trans-unit.source: The maximum area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A área máxima utilizar para apresentar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the area that displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: O real <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> da área de apresenta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma representação de cadeia de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: A string that shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que mostra o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>
